t:parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
t:parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

t:parameter.name: TargetPort
t:parameter.description: Port used by the MSRPC service. Typically 445 (SMB) or 139 (NBT)

t:paramchoice.name: Protocol
t:paramchoice.description: Protocol to connect to target with. Touches will vary with protocol.

t:parameter.name: NetBIOSName
t:parameter.description: Name to use if running touch over NBT, Vista and above require real hostname.

t:parameter.name: TouchLanguage
t:parameter.description: Run language touch against RPC spooler service.

t:parameter.name: TouchArchitecture
t:parameter.description: Run architecture touch against SMB via a memory disclosure bug.

t:parameter.name: Contract
t:parameter.description: The contract fulfilled by this plugin
